page.title: 08Fire at Community College
page.content: Everyone remembers the 20th September 1984 as it affected everyone who lives here. This was the day that the sports complex burned down and a million pounds worth of damage was caused by two youths who ripped open a large landing mat to set fire to the foam. They wanted to distract the office staff counting money which they had planned to steal. Sadly it worked too well as the fire burned down the whole sports complex. Fortunately everyone escaped.The two youths were sentenced to five years custody. The community has rallied around,planning a lot of fund raising events to make the college's facilities even better. The new plans include a theatre and music rooms, as well as to rebuild the sports complex.The swimming pool was back in action in six months, we hope the rest will be rebuilt soon.
